Enumerations

enum  _NE_BANK_FLAGS_ {
  NE_VRAM_A = (1<<0), NE_VRAM_B = (1<<1), NE_VRAM_C = (1<<2), NE_VRAM_D = (1<<3),
  NE_VRAM_AB = NE_VRAM_A | NE_VRAM_B, NE_VRAM_AC = NE_VRAM_A | NE_VRAM_C, NE_VRAM_AD = NE_VRAM_A | NE_VRAM_D, NE_VRAM_BC = NE_VRAM_B | NE_VRAM_C,
  NE_VRAM_BD = NE_VRAM_B | NE_VRAM_D, NE_VRAM_CD = NE_VRAM_C | NE_VRAM_D, NE_VRAM_ABC = NE_VRAM_A | NE_VRAM_B | NE_VRAM_C, NE_VRAM_ABD = NE_VRAM_A | NE_VRAM_B | NE_VRAM_D,
  NE_VRAM_ACD = NE_VRAM_A | NE_VRAM_C | NE_VRAM_D, NE_VRAM_BCD = NE_VRAM_B | NE_VRAM_C | NE_VRAM_D, NE_VRAM_ABCD = NE_VRAM_A | NE_VRAM_B | NE_VRAM_C | NE_VRAM_D
}
 Enum to choose what banks can use Nitro Engine to allocate textures. More...

 Ends texture drawing.

Detailed Description

Texture manipulation functions. A material is just a texture with a color.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum _NE_BANK_FLAGS_

Enum to choose what banks can use Nitro Engine to allocate textures.

Enumerator:
NE_VRAM_A  Use bank A.
NE_VRAM_B  Use bank B.
NE_VRAM_C  Use bank C.
NE_VRAM_D  Use bank D.
NE_VRAM_AB  Use banks A and B.
NE_VRAM_AC  Use banks A and C.
NE_VRAM_AD  Use banks A and D.
NE_VRAM_BC  Use banks B and C.
NE_VRAM_BD  Use banks B and D.
NE_VRAM_CD  Use banks C and D.
NE_VRAM_ABC  Use banks A, B and C.
NE_VRAM_ABD  Use banks A, B and D.
NE_VRAM_ACD  Use banks A, C and D.
NE_VRAM_BCD  Use banks B, C and D.
NE_VRAM_ABCD  Use the 4 main banks.

void NE_MaterialSetDefaultPropierties ( u32  diffuse,
u32  ambient,
u32  specular,
u32  emission,
bool  vtxcolor,
bool  useshininess 
) [inline]

Sets default propierties of materials when they are loaded.

Parameters:
diffuse Set diffuse color, lights that directly hits the polygon.
ambient Set ambient color, lights that indirectly hits the polygon (walls reflections...).
specular Set specular color, lights reflected towards the camera, like a mirror.
emission Set emission color, light emitted by the polygon.
vtxcolor If true, diffuse reflection will work as color command.
useshininess If true, specular reflection will use the shininess table.

void NE_MaterialSetPropierties ( NE_Material *  tex,
u32  diffuse,
u32  ambient,
u32  specular,
u32  emission,
bool  vtxcolor,
bool  useshininess 
) [inline]

Sets propierties of this material.

Parameters:
tex Material.
diffuse Set diffuse color, lights that directly hits the polygon.
ambient Set ambient color, lights that indirectly hits the polygon (walls reflections...).
specular Set specular color, lights reflected towards the camera, like a mirror.
emission Set emission color, light emitted by the polygon.
vtxcolor If true, diffuse reflection will work as color command.
useshininess If true, specular reflection will use the shininess table.

int NE_MaterialTexLoad ( NE_Material *  tex,
GL_TEXTURE_TYPE_ENUM  type,
int  sizeX,
int  sizeY,
int  param,
void *  texture 
)

Load a texture from RAM and set it to a NE_Material struct. Returns 1 if OK, 0 if error.

Parameters:
tex Material.
type Texture type.
sizeX (sizeX, sizeY) Size of texture in pixels. Don't have to be power of 2 :).
sizeY (sizeX, sizeY) Size of texture in pixels. Don't have to be power of 2 :).
param Parameters of the texture.
texture Pointer to the texture.

void NE_MaterialUse ( NE_Material *  tex  ) 

Set next models to be drawn next to use the material.

Delete material.

Parameters:
tex Material to be used.
If NULL, it will disable textures and new polygons won't be affected by them until it is called again.

Parameters:
tex Material.

void NE_TextureDefragMem ( void   ) 

Defragment VRAM used by textures. It may take some time to finish.

NOT WORKING

void NE_TextureDrawingEnd ( void   ) 

Ends texture drawing.

Use this DURING VBL.

void* NE_TextureDrawingStart ( NE_Material *  tex  ) 

Enables drawing for given texture. Returns a pointer to the data.

Parameters:
tex Texture to draw.
Use this DURING VBL. YOU MUST USE NE_TextureDrawingEnd() WHEN YOU FINISH DRAWING. IF YOU DON'T, GPU WON'T BE ABLE TO RENDER ANY TEXTURE TO SCREEN.

void NE_TexturePutPixelRGB256 ( u32  x,
u32  y,
u8  palettecolor 
)

Sets given pixel to "palettecolor".

Parameters:
x (x,y) Pixel coordinates.
y (x,y) Pixel coordinates.
palettecolor New palette color index.
Use this DURING VBL.

void NE_TexturePutPixelRGBA ( u32  x,
u32  y,
u16  color 
)

Puts a pixel to given RGBA texture.

Parameters:
x (x,y) Coordinates.
y (x,y) Coordinates.
color Color in RGB15. Bit 15 must be set to make the pixel visible.
Use this DURING VBL.

void NE_TextureSystemReset ( int  texture_number,
int  palette_number,
_NE_BANK_FLAGS_  bank_flags 
)

Resets texture and palette system.

Parameters:
texture_number Max number of textures. If lower than 1, it will create space for NE_DEFAULT_TEXTURES.
palette_number Max number of palettes. If lower than 1, it will create space for NE_DEFAULT_PALETTES.
bank_flags VRAM banks where Nitro Engine can allocate textures. If Dual 3D mode, only A and B are available. If you are planning to use a depth BMP, you can only use banks A and B. If you don't tell Nitro Engine to use at least a valid bank, it will use the default ones.
